name: The Meth Chef
description:
Who knows how you found yourself in this position, whether it was a need for money, bad habits, or getting in with the wrong crowd. Either way, you are a chef, the meth chef, and it's time to cook. Evade the cops, collect ingredients, and ensure you put them in the right order. If not, the lab could go up in flames.
